issue.title: [GitHub] Add CONTRIBUTING.md and ISSUE_TEMPLATE.md
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1498](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1498). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We have enabled Issues on GitHub as a lighter weight way for users to engage with the Arrow developers. We should add the appropriate GitHub markdown documents so that users are directed to take the appropriate actions should they wish to contribute a patch or file a feature request in JIRA
